thread.title: Lisa (Waterloo WI)
thread.title_full: Avas Flowers reviewed by Lisa (Waterloo WI)

author: Lisa (Waterloo WI)
title: Lisa (Waterloo WI)
text: Was happy to find a company where I could order flowers and have them delivered in a very small town that is not near any major flower shops. We don't have many resources available to us to have flowers delivered. I also received a prompt phone call from the company on a small issue that was just a misunderstanding and I appreciate the time they took to get back to me the next morning.
